summary: I made a simple mod to make Auriel's Bow craftable and enchantable. Auriel's Bow is one of my favorite weapons, but I didn't like the fact that I couldn't enchant it myself. Now that problem is solved.
descriptionHtml:
I made a simple mod to make Auriel's Bow craftable and enchantable. Auriel's Bow is one of my favorite weapons, but I didn't like the fact that I couldn't enchant it myself. Now that problem is solved.

I also made the bow craftable, because this bow does NOT replace the original Auriel's Bow. This mod offers a duplicated bow, without vanilla enchantments and with the option to enchant it yourself. I might upload a version of this mod that replaces the vanilla bow later on.

You can obtain the bow by crafting it, using five gold ingots. You'll find the bow under the "elven" category.

Note: the crafting requirements are temporary. I will polish that later.

Pictures are from Auriel's Bow, redesigned by Noldorian Auriels Bow and Quiver: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29329/?
author: Skyrimlal
